name: Project Exiles
description:
A transformation of the perception of drawing, in which rivers of ink spill over endless paper wastelands. The accumulation of black is intensified and the image is transformed from a plane into a space, a place in which one can immerse oneself, but which is not necessarily welcoming. It is an exile into the world of a drawing.

Project currently in development.

Szymon Baran

Intermedia, ASP Kraków 2022r.
